tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE therapist_resources (
  resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  resource_name VARCHAR(255),
  resource_type VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)
CREATE TABLE therapists ( therapist_id INT PRIMARY KEY, therapist_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, specialty VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE resources ( resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY, resource_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT, category VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE resources (
  resource_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  resource_name VARCHAR(255),
  resource_category VARCHAR(100),
  resource_type VARCHAR(100),
  resource_link VARCHAR(255),
  therapist_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE sessions (
  session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  session_date TIMESTAMP,
  session_notes TEXT,
  therapist_id UUID,
  resource_id UUID
);
CREATE TABLE therapists ( therapist_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, therapist_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, therapist_specialty VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE resources ( resource_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, resource_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, resource_type VARCHAR(50), resource_url VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE sessions ( session_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, therapist_id INT NOT NULL, start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(100) );
CREATE TABLE materials ( material_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, resource_id INT NOT NULL, material_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, material_type VARCHAR(50), material_description TEXT );

CREATE TABLE sessions ( 
 session_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 session_date DATE NOT NULL, 
 therapist_id INT NOT NULL, 
 client_id INT NOT NULL, 
 CONSTRAINT fk_therapist_id_sessions FOREIGN KEY (therapist_id) REFERENCES therapists(therapist_id), 
 CONSTRAINT fk_client_id_sessions FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES clients(client_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE session_materials ( 
 session_material_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 session_id INT NOT NULL, 
 resource_id INT NOT NULL, 
 quantity INT NOT NULL, 
 CONSTRAINT fk_session_id_mat FOREIGN KEY (session_id) REFERENCES sessions(session_id), 
 CONSTRAINT fk_resource_id_mat FOREIGN KEY (resource_id) REFERENCES resources(resource_id) 
);
